en.title: How to Use FLUX.1 Dev
en.description: Learn how to get the best results from FLUX.1 Dev AI image generation

steps.title: Write Effective Prompts
steps.description: Create detailed, descriptive prompts for best results. Be specific about what you want to see, include details about style, lighting, and composition.

steps.title: Choose the Right Settings
steps.description: Select appropriate aspect ratio for your intended use, use 28-35 inference steps for balanced quality and speed, and generate multiple images to explore variations.

steps.title: Refine Your Results
steps.description: Experiment with different prompt phrasings, adjust inference steps if quality isn't satisfactory, and try different aspect ratios for various compositions.

steps.title: Best Practices
steps.description: Keep prompts focused but descriptive, use consistent terminology for similar styles, and consider the model's strengths in photorealism and detail.

zh.title: 如何使用 FLUX.1 Dev
zh.description: 学习如何从FLUX.1 Dev AI图像生成中获得最佳效果

steps.title: 编写有效的提示词
steps.description: 创建详细、描述性的提示词以获得最佳效果。具体描述您想看到的内容，包含关于风格、光照和构图的细节。

steps.title: 选择正确的设置
steps.description: 为您的预期用途选择适当的宽高比，使用28-35个推理步数来平衡质量和速度，生成多张图像来探索变化。

steps.title: 完善您的结果
steps.description: 尝试不同的提示词表述，如果质量不满意则调整推理步数，尝试不同的宽高比以获得各种构图。

steps.title: 最佳实践
steps.description: 保持提示词专注但具有描述性，对相似风格使用一致的术语，考虑模型在逼真度和细节方面的优势。
